headline: Viavi Solutions (VIAV) Is Up 27.4% After Spirent Asset Acquisition and Raised Revenue Guidance – What's Changed
summary: Viavi Solutions recently reported quarterly revenue of US$299.1 million, exceeding expectations, and issued upbeat guidance for the second quarter of fiscal 2026, projecting net revenue between US$360 million and US$370 million, with non-GAAP earnings per share forecast at US$0.18 to US$0.20. An important development is the completed acquisition of Spirent’s high-speed ethernet, network security, and channel emulation test business from Keysight Technologies, which is expected to contribute...

headline: Keysight Technologies (KEYS): A Fresh Look at Valuation as Share Momentum Rebuilds
summary: Keysight Technologies (KEYS) shares are holding steady as investors take stock of the company's recent performance. For those tracking the tech sector, Keysight’s movement this week presents a fresh opportunity to review its fundamentals and recent returns. See our latest analysis for Keysight Technologies. After some ups and downs this year, Keysight’s 5.99% year-to-date share price return signals solid momentum is building again. Looking further back, the company’s 12.17% one-year total...
